org.gjt.sp.jedit
Class ActionContext

java.lang.Object
  org.gjt.sp.jedit.ActionContext

public abstract class ActionContext
extends java.lang.Object

Manages a collection of action sets. There are two instances of this class in jEdit:

  • jEdit.getActionContext() - editor actions
  • VFSBrowser.getActionContext() - browser actions

Since:
jEdit 4.2pre1

abstract  void invokeAction(java.util.EventObject evt, EditAction action)
